column4: hallo, just started trying to use Evolution, since it comes with Ubuntu.  I'm used to Thunderbird, so this is a little different.  I have an e-mail account I access using POP3 and webmail.  In Thunderbird, I select "Leave messages on server" and then under that there's an option that will delete the message on the server if I delete it in the client.  I don't see such an option in Evolution.  Is there one?
usually you can only do that with IMAP.  Are you sure you did it using POP?
